attributes.action: Make Christopher Chope resign as mp
attributes.background:
Christopher Chope blocked a bill to prevent photographs being taken of people under their clothes without consent. Imagine being a person against sexual harassment.
I find this disgusting and so do the majority of mp's, this is a call for Christopher Chope to resign.

rejection.details:
The resignation of an MP would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

If you'd like the procedure of objecting to Bills to change, you may wish to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/222338

If you'd like the law on upskirting to change, you may wish to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/216290
